Admin Widget

admin_widget.Rd

Admin Widget

Usage

admin_widget(id)

Arguments

id

the module id

Value

a tagList() object to admin the data model

Examples

admin_widget(id = "mydata")
#> <div class="row">
#>   <div class="col-sm-2 well">
#>     <ul class="nav nav-pills nav-stacked" data-tabsetid="9343">
